Title: Relates to assessment relief for victims of a local or major disaster
Summary: Relates to assessment relief for victims of a local or major disaster in an eligible municipality.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง467-n, RPT L; amd ยง4, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.7515-A & A.7748-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to assessment relief for victims of a local or major disaster in an eligible municipality; to repeal section 467-n of the real property tax law, relating to assessment relief for disasters; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the real property tax law relating to enacting the "climate change property tax relief act", as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 7515-A and A. 7748-B, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
